name: David Fussichen
title: CEO of Analytics8 | Empowering executives with the information they need to make good decisions, fast.
about:
“What do you want to be when you grow up?”

When I was a kid, at one point or another, I wanted to be a magician, archaeologist,
artist, and engineer.

“President of a data analytics company” was never on my list. But I think my goals
revealed something about my underlying values early on.

- Magicians take the mystical and make it real for anyone. We make the mystical real
for business leaders every day.

- Archaeologists explore the unknown. You can’t watch my team sift through data and
tell us we're not looking for the needle in the haystack - like explorers.

- Artists tell a story out of the mundane. This is kind of our thing with data at
Analytics8.

- Engineers build to innovate, and I strongly believe that without data, innovation
would be impossible.

I'm proud of leading a company of individuals who solve real life problems with data and analytics. Having been in the industry long before data and analytics were buzzwords that dominated the landscape, my team has the resources and connections of a large-scale vendor, but with the attention of a boutique firm. We cut through the noise to get results fast.

about:
Entrepreneur, AI/ML specialist, tech leader, NSF Co-PI

Vance Reavie is the visionary founder and CEO of Junction AI, an innovative tech startup redefining intelligent automation through a proprietary agentic AI platform. 

With over 2 decades of experience at the intersection of advanced technology and business consulting, Vance has proven success in transforming complex challenges into scalable, real-world solutions that deliver real ROI.

Prior to founding Junction AI, Vance led digital transformation initiatives for enterprise, government and non profit clients, specializing in strategy, automation architecture, and operational efficiency. This hands-on consulting background shaped Junction AI’s core philosophy: innovation must be explainable, adaptable, and grounded in practical value.

Under Vance’s leadership, Junction AI has developed a proprietary AI agentic platform that combines cutting-edge agentic intelligence with enterprise-grade configurability, accuracy and transparency. His approach to leadership is deeply collaborative, blending technical rigor with a clear vision for ethical and impactful AI.

Vance is a frequent speaker on the future of technology and innovation, AI, a mentor to emerging tech leaders, and a passionate advocate for improving government policies for the startup sector and entrepreneurs in Washington DC and beyond.

name: Hans Schreuder
title: Strategy, Growth & Investment | Bayobab
about:
Hans Schreuder is the General Manager for Strategy & Business Development at Bayobab Group. Since joining the company in 2021, Hans has held various strategic roles that have seen him play a critical role in shaping and executing the strategic direction of Bayobab.

Hans has over 19 years of experience in the Telecom and Tech industries focusing on strategy, growth and transformation. Prior to joining Bayobab Group, Hans held various executive positions including Head of Corporate Strategy & Transformation in a GCC telecom incumbent operator and co-founded an AI startup focused on enterprise productivity. He spent the first 10 years of his career in top-tier M&A advisory and strategy consulting roles at Bear Stearns, NM Rothschild and Delta Partners. 

Hans has lived and worked across the MEA region for 15 years and in addition to his day-to-day activities, he is also a tech investor and holds various Board and advisory roles. He is an avid traveller, having visited over 70 countries with on-the-ground professional experience in over 30 countries. However, when grounded, he enjoys spending time outdoors with his family and reading history books.

Hans holds a BSc in Business Management from Babson College with a concentration in Finance.

name: Tommy Weir
title: Founder & CEO of enaible | Author
about:
In 2018, when Dr. Weir looked at the available productivity solutions, he saw products that were too rigid to handle the complexity and nuances of knowledge workers, and that common performance metrics and measurements–such as MBO, KPI, and OKR–masked the insights employees, managers and executives needed.

He also saw how 21st-century management will be disrupted–by applying machine learning to employees working and humans leading–and have a positive, lasting impact on employees and companies. That’s why he founded enaible to bring data science to leadership science, it’s now possible to know and do what was impossible.

Prior to founding enaible, Dr. Weir spent two decades coaching CEOs and conducting cutting-edge leadership research, which allowed him to see how flat productivity creates unnecessary margin pressure. Combining his rich leadership experience with breakthrough data science methodologies, as founder and CEO of enaible Inc., he now focuses on applying AI to help employees Get Better | Work Smarter | Achieve More.

In addition to developing new AI solutions for business leaders and leading businesses, Dr. Weir is a prolific author. His books on leadership have earned numerous accolades, including #1 best-seller status on Amazon, First Finalist in the International Book Awards, and the #2 book in the Wall Street Journal’s Readers Poll.

Dr. Weir holds a doctorate in strategic leadership from Regent University. He is a sought-after speaker and former visiting scientist at MIT Media Lab.

Follow Dr. Tommy on twitter @tommyweir
To book Dr. Tommy to speak, contact the London Speakers Bureau.
awards_and_recognitions: #1 best-seller status on Amazon for 'Leadership Dubai Style'; First Finalist in the International Book Awards for 'Leadership Dubai Style'; #2 book in the Wall Street Journal’s Readers Poll for 'Ten Tips for Leading in the Middle East'
speaking_engagements: Interview about Enaible's AI productivity platform on YouTube; Contributor articles on leadership and AI productivity in EdTech Magazine and Dataversity
reasoning: Dr. Tommy Weir demonstrates significant academic credentials and professional experience as a leadership expert and consultant, fitting the L3 'Technical and Management Veterans' profile. While he has founded a technology company (enaible), there isn't clear evidence of major exits, significant funding rounds, or previous startup successes that would warrant a higher classification. His background shows deep domain expertise in leadership and strategic management, with over two decades of experience consulting CEOs, but his entrepreneurial track record appears limited to his current venture.

name: Peter Nowack
title: CEO Gamma Placetel GmbH
about:
Peter Nowack brings over 25 years of experience in the telecommunications industry, with a strong track record in innovation, leadership, and entrepreneurship. Over the past 15+ years, he has founded and led several pioneering communication companies, including finocom AG – the company behind Placetel – which was acquired by BroadSoft Inc. in 2013 and later integrated into Cisco.

Peter started his career at Deutsche Telekom after earning his Master’s degree in Engineering. His early success in key account management led to international leadership roles in Hong Kong and Singapore, followed by strategic executive positions in Germany that helped shape Telekom’s transition into the IP voice and data era.

Peter Nowack is an experienced telecommunications executive with a strong entrepreneurial background. From 2019 to 2024, he served as Managing Director of Placetel at Cisco, where he led the brand’s growth and integration into Cisco’s UCaaS portfolio – scaling its presence in the German SMB market while preserving its startup spirit.

Since October 2024, Peter has been CEO of Gamma Placetel GmbH, a newly formed entity within the Gamma Communications Group. In this role, he is responsible for driving strategic and operational development, with a clear focus on innovation, customer value, and continued growth in the European cloud communications space.

He is also a recognized speaker at major telecom and IT leadership events worldwide.

name: Andre Mullen, MBA
title: Founder & CEO of Paradigm | weareparadigm.co
location: West Hempstead, New York, United States
about:
In over my 3 decades of experience in the music and tech industry, I have grossed close to $7M dollars in new business, deals, publishing, and royalties for artists and labels.

Then, in 2021, I burned out.

However, before I could, I had an idea.

I believed working with artist managers to focus on processes and systems would scale their client's as well as their own businesses and create sustainability. That belief fueled my desire to help artists managers help artists through community building and the sharing of information.

So, I started delivering a newsletter, The Paradigm Shift, every week, in January 2023.

In that year, I met many artists and artist managers who needed help. 

However, I took a detour by joining a company that within 6 months, I would end up leaving.

Only to come back to my purpose:

Wanting to see artists win.

So, I tapped into my resources and my network and created Paradigm - an independent publisher specializing in marketing and talent management.

I have never felt so free in my life.

You want to know more? Stay tuned to this space...
speaking_engagements: Hosts newsletter 'Paradigm Shift' sharing frameworks and insights on artist management and creative business growth; Offers 1:1 Growth Strategy Calls on growth, strategy, content, and monetization

name: Björn Stansvik
title: CEO at Byggr.ai
about:
As CEO and Co-founder of Byggr.ai since March 1, 2024, I now lead an innovative company based in San Francisco that is transforming the software development industry. Byggr.ai empowers development teams with a novel, patented approach using our proprietary foundational AI model, DALMA (Deterministic Architectural Language Model Algorithm). DALMA is not just another LLM-based code completion tool. While LLMs are great at synthesizing human thought, they are less effective at generating precise, large-scale syntax for entire applications. We use LLMs to bootstrap human intentions, translating them into a machine-readable “abstract model.” DALMA then processes this model to create limitless, tested, and architecturally sound source code.

In software development, we’ve seen the evolution from Waterfall to Agile. Now, Byggr is introducing the next generation of development: The Byggr Studio. Visit Byggr.ai to join the waitlist and be among the first to know before we make headlines. Whether you're a startup looking to get to market faster, an IT services firm seeking to outpace competitors, or a builder aiming to reduce technical debt, DALMA is the industry’s first AI architect, developer, quality assurance, and business analyst - combined into one.

Before Byggr, I spent over two decades building MentorMate from the ground up. After immigrating from Sweden to Minnesota, I grew the company from scratch, bootstrapping to 1,100 employees across 40 countries, culminating in a 9-figure exit to Tietoevry. Founded in 2001, MentorMate grew into a global leader in software design and development. We pioneered solutions that helped clients envision the future of their digital platforms. I vividly recall pitching an early mobile cloud learning app to investors who doubted mobile technology would be a big market for at least five more years. We prevailed by staying ahead of the curve, just as Byggr is now shaping the future of AI-driven software development.

MentorMate’s global reach, with offices in the U.S., Sweden, Bulgaria, and Paraguay, allowed us to deliver world-class design and development services worldwide. This same commitment to innovation at scale (a Byggr scale!) drives me at Byggr.ai, where we are redefining software development through our cutting-edge, in-house foundational AI model, DALMA, making our services accessible and impactful to clients around the globe, thereby democratizing software development.

name: Puneet Kataria
title: ⭐ Founder SuperRep.ai, an 🤖 AI BDR/SDR for Outbound Sales | 👉 LinkedIn Top Voice 2019
about:
Building AI for B2B Outbound Sales. 

Founder at 👉 SuperRep.ai, an 🤖 AI BDR/SDR for b2b outbound Sales.

I am deeply passionate about the four product joys. The joy of innovating, the joy of selling, the joy of subscribing and the joy of customer success.

A non-believer in traditional approaches, I am convinced that the world is changing faster than ever before. The future belongs to those who will adapt. The big and the muscular will get outpaced by the lean and agile. Ability to unlearn is more critical than decades of old school experience. Market-share is dead, mind-share is the new arena where the winners are decided.

In the Subscription economy, acquisition is not enough. It is all about delivering value and ensuring success for your customers over creating fat shelf-ware. 

I do not bet on gut, but rather on enlightenment from experiments that prove the hypothesis either right or wrong. Remember, its always easy to be different but difficult to be better.

Reaching customers has never been so easy, but only for those who are plugged in this connected world. Those stuck in the traditional ways continue to struggle in a loosing battle. Today is about being open, being truthful, about listening and about engaging. Mindless one way spamming of advertisement is old and slow, unbiased social proof is key to success. 

Leadership is about cultivating a self driven culture, empowering teams to think freely and act independently, with responsibility and courage. While taking baby steps in the unknown and the uncertain, lighting up a dark forest layer by layer, without any fear of failure. Because every failure is a fresh leaning.
